channel.title: Comments on: The Best Ever Pancake Recipe

item.title: By: Miranda
item.dc:creator: Miranda
item.description: i made these but substituted the flour for wholemeal spelt and aded some linseed crush, i also replaced the sugar with coconut sugar. they were fantastic. HAPPY MOTHERS DAY TO ME!
item.content:encoded:
i made these but substituted the flour for wholemeal spelt and aded some linseed crush, i also replaced the sugar with coconut sugar.
they were fantastic. HAPPY MOTHERS DAY TO ME!

item.title: By: Egg
item.dc:creator: Egg
item.description: Awesome pancakes kids love them I love fat fluffy pancakes
item.content:encoded: Awesome pancakes kids love them I love fat fluffy pancakes

item.title: By: Freerange_ leilarni
item.dc:creator: Freerange_ leilarni
item.description: Our second time using this recipe! Love it. We add a bit more milk as we go, like them a tad more runny :) thanks for posting
item.content:encoded: Our second time using this recipe! Love it. We add a bit more milk as we go, like them a tad more runny ðŸ™‚ thanks for posting

item.title: By: FeeFee26
item.dc:creator: FeeFee26
item.description: I am making them now and they look delicious but i added just a pinch of vanilla essences i love your recipe thanks so much website owner
item.content:encoded: I am making them now and they look delicious but i added just a pinch of vanilla essences i love your recipe thanks so much website owner

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: very interesting im about to make them for me and my dad
item.content:encoded: very interesting im about to make them for me and my dad

item.title: By: Leesa
item.dc:creator: Leesa
item.description: The bowl is nice but the pancakes are to die for We have them sunday mornings for breakie the kids can't get enough of them Thank you so much for sharing this recipe and there is never room for desert
item.content:encoded:
The bowl is nice but the pancakes are to die for
We have them sunday mornings for breakie the kids can’t get enough of them
Thank you so much for sharing this recipe and there is never room for desert

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma
item.description: Made these this morning and they were delish! Extra delicious with nutella on them. :)
item.content:encoded: Made these this morning and they were delish! Extra delicious with nutella on them. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Everyone and thanks for all your lovely comments.
Glad everyone liked the bowl and some have other bowls/plates etc that also have recipes.
Hi Parita - Thanks, banana would be great with them
Hi Arwen - Hahahaha, I know what you mean, that's a little silly :P
Hi Lorraine - Yes, "best ever" is very subjective, I found that out just two days ago when people were choosing their favourite profiterole.
Hi Tina - I would be interested to see if that was a good recipe
Hi Rudy - I bought the bowl from Peters of Kensington (in Sydney). I bought it a few years ago, and Peters of Kensington still have some of the Primo "Best Ever" range on their website, although not the pancake bowl. Perhaps check with them if they are still stocking it. Hope that helps :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Everyone and thanks for all your lovely comments.

Glad everyone liked the bowl and some have other bowls/plates etc that also have recipes.

Hi Parita – Thanks, banana would be great with them

Hi Arwen – Hahahaha, I know what you mean, that’s a little silly ðŸ˜›

Hi Lorraine – Yes, “best ever” is very subjective, I found that out just two days ago when people were choosing their favourite profiterole.

Hi Tina – I would be interested to see if that was a good recipe

Hi Rudy – I bought the bowl from Peters of Kensington (in Sydney). I bought it a few years ago, and Peters of Kensington still have some of the Primo “Best Ever” range on their website, although not the pancake bowl. Perhaps check with them if they are still stocking it. Hope that helps ðŸ™‚

item.description: Haha - they look good! I have curvy soup bowl/mug that has a recipe for onion soup which I've never tried...
